column5: Our home is newly built with this bedroom space having 150 square feet en-suite with your own bathroom and shower on the second floor. The living space is open with hardwood floors, tall ceilings and an airy feel. Our place is close to the airport, public transport, Las Colinas city center, DFW, DAL, AA Center. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the comfy bed, the high ceilings and the location. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
